local_intent: Open the green bin’s hinged lid, confirm it is open, then retreat slightly.
assumptions: End effector is already positioned on the lid edge and grasped from prior steps
TCP yaw is appropriate from earlier alignment
Bin and lid remain within the current camera view
coherence_with_global: Keeps perceive→act→verify→retreat around the OpenContainer micro-goal, re-detects lid if not visible, retries open up to 2 times, then checks ContainerOpen and retreats. Targets and parameters match the global plan.
